title: The Impact Of The World's Richest Man On US Democracy
content: How much influence can the worlds richest man have over one of the worlds oldest democracies? Next weeks elections are not just about Donald Trump and Kamala Harris but also a measure of Elon Musks influence on American democracy.
summary: How much influence can the worlds richest man have over one of the worlds oldest democracies? Next weeks elections are not just about Donald Trump and Kamala Harris but also a measure of Elon Musks influence on American democracy.

title: The Changing Face Of The Oval Office - All The US Presidents Since 1900
content: A look at how American leadership has evolved through major historical events and societal changes over the past century
summary: A look at how American leadership has evolved through major historical events and societal changes over the past century

title: Trump Makes Risky Last-Ditch Effort: Campaigns In New Mexico And Virginia
content: Donald Trump is taking a bold move in the final days of his presidential campaign by visiting New Mexico and Virginia, two states that have historically been difficult for Republican candidates to win.
summary: Donald Trump is taking a bold move in the final days of his presidential campaign by visiting New Mexico and Virginia, two states that have historically been difficult for Republican candidates to win.

title: Woman Strips At Iran University To Protest Strict Dress Code: Reports
content: A young woman stripped to her underwear at an Iranian university on Saturday in an apparent protest against the country's strict Islamic dress code, according to online videos and media reports.
summary: A young woman stripped to her underwear at an Iranian university on Saturday in an apparent protest against the country's strict Islamic dress code, according to online videos and media reports.

title: "Some Friends May Be More Complicated...": S Jaishankar On Diplomatic Ties
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Saturday emphasised that friendships are no longer exclusive, especially in the emerging multipolar world, adding that some global partners might be more complicated than others in the world.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Saturday emphasised that friendships are no longer exclusive, especially in the emerging multipolar world, adding that some global partners might be more complicated than others in the world.

title: All About Kamala Harris: Life, Family, Wealth And Her Impact On US Politics
content: Kamala Devi Harris was born on October 20, 1964, in Oakland, California, to immigrant parents.
summary: Kamala Devi Harris was born on October 20, 1964, in Oakland, California, to immigrant parents.

title: Kemi Badenoch Is New Chief Of UK's Conservative Party, Succeeds Rishi Sunak
content: The Conservative Party of the UK elected Kemi Badenoch as the new leader of the party on Saturday (local time), Euro News reported.
summary: The Conservative Party of the UK elected Kemi Badenoch as the new leader of the party on Saturday (local time), Euro News reported.

title: 19 Injured In Rocket Strike On Building In Israel's Arab Town Of Tira
content: A missile strike in Israel's Sharon area wounded 19 people, police said early Saturday, after the army reported three projectiles were fired from Lebanon into central Israel.
summary: A missile strike in Israel's Sharon area wounded 19 people, police said early Saturday, after the army reported three projectiles were fired from Lebanon into central Israel.

title: Amid Rising Attacks, Big March In Bangladesh For Hindus, Other Minorities
content: Hundreds marched in Bangladesh's capital Saturday to demand protections for Hindus and other minorities who say they have suffered violence and threats since the ouster of autocratic premier Sheikh Hasina.
summary: Hundreds marched in Bangladesh's capital Saturday to demand protections for Hindus and other minorities who say they have suffered violence and threats since the ouster of autocratic premier Sheikh Hasina.

title: Indian Firms Sanctioned By US Not In Violation Of National Laws: Centre
content: The Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) on Saturday reacted to the recent US sanctions imposed on several Indian firms and nationals, with a spokesperson stating that Indian companies have not violated any national laws.
summary: The Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) on Saturday reacted to the recent US sanctions imposed on several Indian firms and nationals, with a spokesperson stating that Indian companies have not violated any national laws.

title: Diwali Is Reminder South Asian Americans Have Enriched US: Blinken
content: Diwali is a reminder of the many ways Americans of South Asian descent have enriched the United States, Secretary of State Tony Blinken said Friday as he hosted the annual reception of the festival of lights.
summary: Diwali is a reminder of the many ways Americans of South Asian descent have enriched the United States, Secretary of State Tony Blinken said Friday as he hosted the annual reception of the festival of lights.

title: Trump Pits Americans Against One Another, US Deserves Better: Harris
content: "America deserves better than what Donald Trump is offering. America deserves a president who understands our role and responsibility to our people and to the rest of the world to be a model," she said.
summary: "America deserves better than what Donald Trump is offering. America deserves a president who understands our role and responsibility to our people and to the rest of the world to be a model," she said.

title: Will End Economic Disaster Of Kamala Harris: Donald Trump
content: Describing the economic policies of Vice President Kamala Harris as a disaster, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Friday said he would launch a brand new economic miracle after he wins the elections.
summary: Describing the economic policies of Vice President Kamala Harris as a disaster, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Friday said he would launch a brand new economic miracle after he wins the elections.

title: COP16 Summit Ends Without Funding Roadmap, Set To Reconvene On Key Issues
content: The world's biggest nature conservation conference closed in Colombia on Saturday with no agreement on a roadmap to ramp up funding for species protection.
summary: The world's biggest nature conservation conference closed in Colombia on Saturday with no agreement on a roadmap to ramp up funding for species protection.

title: Hope To Deter Illegal Immigration With India-US Cooperation: Centre
content: Days after the US authorities deported a batch of Indian nationals who were staying in that country illegally, New Delhi Saturday said it hopes that with India-US cooperation on mobility and migration, "we will be able to deter illegal immigration".
summary: Days after the US authorities deported a batch of Indian nationals who were staying in that country illegally, New Delhi Saturday said it hopes that with India-US cooperation on mobility and migration, "we will be able to deter illegal immigration".

title: JLo Tears Up, Condemns Trumps Rally As "Offensive To Humanity"
content: Jennifer Lopez joined forces with Kamala Harris in Nevada and delivered a passionate speech. "It wasn't just Puerto Ricans that were offended," Lopez said.
summary: Jennifer Lopez joined forces with Kamala Harris in Nevada and delivered a passionate speech. "It wasn't just Puerto Ricans that were offended," Lopez said.

title: American Bar And Grill Chain TGI Fridays Files For Bankruptcy
content: Casual American dining chain TGI Fridays filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy on Saturday in the US state of Texas, a company statement said.
summary: Casual American dining chain TGI Fridays filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy on Saturday in the US state of Texas, a company statement said.

title: India A "Cyber Adversary", Says Trudeau Government, New Delhi Shreds Claim
content: The Justin Trudeau-led Canadian government's latest action suggests it has started treating India as an enemy country. India has been added to a list of enemy nations in terms of cyber security and has been labelled a 'cyber adversary'.
summary: The Justin Trudeau-led Canadian government's latest action suggests it has started treating India as an enemy country. India has been added to a list of enemy nations in terms of cyber security and has been labelled a 'cyber adversary'.

title: "Harassment, Intimidation": India On Surveillance Of Officials In Canada
content: As its ties with Canada continued to remain at an all-time low, India on Saturday said some of its consular officials were informed by the Canadian government that they have been under audio and video surveillance.
summary: As its ties with Canada continued to remain at an all-time low, India on Saturday said some of its consular officials were informed by the Canadian government that they have been under audio and video surveillance.

title: Canadian Diplomat Summoned After Allegations Against Amit Shah By Minister
content: Rubbishing a Canadian minister's claims that Home Minister Amit Shah had ordered the targeting of Sikh separatists in the country, India has termed them absurd and baseless and said a representative of the Canadian High Commission had been summoned.
summary: Rubbishing a Canadian minister's claims that Home Minister Amit Shah had ordered the targeting of Sikh separatists in the country, India has termed them absurd and baseless and said a representative of the Canadian High Commission had been summoned.
